Package cpsc2150.extendedConnectX.models

Interface IGameBoard

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbsGameBoard, GameBoard, GameBoardMem
public interface IGameBoard
IGameBoard interface for game board operations checkIfFree, dropToken, checkForWin, checkTie, checkHorizWin, checkVertWin, checkDiagWin, whatsAtPos, isPlayerAtPos. Game board is used to manage, update, and check the status of the connect 5 game.

  • Method Details

    • checkIfFree

      default boolean checkIfFree(int c)
      Checks if the specified column has available space for a token, accepts one param.
      Parameters:
      c - the column number to check (0 â‰¤ c < number of columns)
      Returns:
      true if the column c can accept another token, false if the column is full

    • dropToken

      void dropToken(char p, int c)
      Drops a player's token into the specified column, accepts two params.
      Parameters:
      p - the player's token (either 'X' or 'O')
      c - the column number where the token will be dropped (0 â‰¤ c < number of columns)

    • checkForWin

      default boolean checkForWin(int c)
      Checks if the last token placed in the specified column resulted in a win, accepts one param
      Parameters:
      c - the column where the last token was placed (0 â‰¤ c < number of columns)
      Returns:
      true if the last token placed in column c resulted in a win; otherwise, false

    • checkTie

      default boolean checkTie()
      Checks if the game has ended in a tie.
      Returns:
      true if the game is tied (i.e., no available positions), otherwise false

    • checkHorizWin

      default boolean checkHorizWin(BoardPosition pos, char p)
      Checks if the last token placed at the given position resulted in a horizontal win, accepts two params
      Parameters:
      pos - the position of the last token placed
      p - the player's token (either 'X' or 'O')
      Returns:
      true if the last token placed at position pos resulted in 5 in a row horizontally, otherwise false

    • checkVertWin

      default boolean checkVertWin(BoardPosition pos, char p)
      Checks if the last token placed at the given position resulted in a vertical win, accepts two params.
      Parameters:
      pos - the position of the last token placed
      p - the player's token (either 'X' or 'O')
      Returns:
      true if the last token placed at position pos resulted in 5 in a row vertically, otherwise false

    • checkDiagWin

      default boolean checkDiagWin(BoardPosition pos, char p)
      Checks if the last token placed at the given position resulted in a diagonal win, accepts two params.
      Parameters:
      pos - the position of the last token placed
      p - the player's token (either 'X' or 'O')
      Returns:
      true if the last token placed at position pos resulted in 5 in a row diagonally, otherwise false

    • whatsAtPos

      char whatsAtPos(BoardPosition pos)
      Retrieves the character at the given board position, accepts one param.
      Parameters:
      pos - the position to check
      Returns:
      the character at position pos ('X', 'O', or a blank space if no token is placed there)

    • isPlayerAtPos

      default boolean isPlayerAtPos(BoardPosition pos, char player)
      Checks if the given player's token is at the specified position, accepts two params.
      Parameters:
      pos - the position to check
      player - the player's token ('X' or 'O')
      Returns:
      true if the player's token is at position pos, otherwise false
